printed on super soft Tultex shirts

show off with this Punch shirt.
Get asked "wtf is a Canyons?"

name: CHNN Shirt
description:
This shirt printed on Ultra Soft Tultex & American Apparel
is themed around the recently released 
"Can't Have Nothin' Nice" 12" split with Tigon & Foreign Theaters

name: Canyons / Tigon / Foreign Theaters - Can't Have Nothin' Nice
description:
Missouri's Canyons, Tigon from the California Bay area and Foreign Theaters also from Missouri to bring you this 12in split titled "Can't Have Nothin' Nice" 
As we've come to expect, Canyons four tracks combine metal, hardcore, and rock perfectly. These tracks combine the raw passion of hardcore with heavy groove driven guitars for a sound unique to them. Think of them as Every Time I Die mixed with Clutch, Down, Coalesce, and Botch. 
Next Tigon brings their mix of 90's screamo, hardcore, metal, and punk. Think Botch, At The Drive-In, Engineer, and The Minor Times. These songs are heavy, technical , chaotic, and powerful all at once. 
Foreign Theaters finishes off this split with four songs that instantly bring to mind old Touch and Go Records(Jesus Lizard, Shellac, or Therapy?) or late 90's discord played heavier. These driving mid tempo tracks just pound away from beginning to end with no let up. Think Young Widows, Melvins, and a tinge of Kylesa.

This record is a split release with Mayfly Records, Meletov Records, and The Ghost is Clear Records. 
First pressing is 500 
500 recycled black vinyl 
all Mayfly Records come with a free digital download.

name: Mons Wolff / Canyons split 7" 2009
description:
Mayfly Records second release, with artwork by Juan Gabe of Comadre.  This 7" is beautiful.  Both Canyons hailing from Marshall, MO and Mons Wolff from Vegas share a love for metal influenced hardcore. This does not mean cheesy breakdowns with clean vocals, this means respect for such bands as Coalesce, Integrity, and Bleeding Kansas. Where these bands differ is Canyons plays a more groove driven style like Mastadon or Down. On the other hand Mons Wolff plays a more chaotic style in vein of Converge or Breather Resist. This release showcases the good side of what happens when metal and hardcore mix! 
All records come with a free digital download!

name: Regret, The Informer / Canyons split cd 2008
description:
Regret, the Informer and Canyons team up to show you just what Missouri has cookin in the Screamo and Hardcore area.  Rather than only bitching about the shitty town they are from Canyons delivers loud and proud 3 jams they cooked to break the monotony.
Regret, the Informer take it to the next.. just killin it with thier own style.  This shit is crazy considering where it comes from.
